org.openimaj.image.analysis.algorithm

Class TemplateMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.analysis.algorithm.TemplateMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageAnalyser<FImage>

    public class TemplateMatcher
extends Object
implements ImageAnalyser<FImage>
    Basic template matching for FImages. Template matching is performed in the spatial domain.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TemplateMatcher.Mode
      Different algorithms for comparing templates to images.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      TemplateMatcher(FImage template, TemplateMatcher.Mode mode)
      Default constructor with the template to match and the mode with which to estimate template responses.
      TemplateMatcher(FImage template, TemplateMatcher.Mode mode, Rectangle bounds)
      Construct with the template to match, the mode with which to estimate template responses and the bounds rectangle in which to search.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TemplateMatcher

        public TemplateMatcher(FImage template,
                       TemplateMatcher.Mode mode)
        Default constructor with the template to match and the mode with which to estimate template responses. When matching is performed by analyseImage(FImage), the whole image will be searched.
        Parameters:
        template - The template
        mode - The mode.

      • TemplateMatcher

        public TemplateMatcher(FImage template,
                       TemplateMatcher.Mode mode,
                       Rectangle bounds)
        Construct with the template to match, the mode with which to estimate template responses and the bounds rectangle in which to search. The search bounds rectangle is defined with respect to the centre of the template.
        Parameters:
        template - The template
        mode - The mode.
        bounds - The bounding box for search.

    • Method Detail

      • getSearchBounds

        public Rectangle getSearchBounds()
        Returns:
        the search bound rectangle

      • setSearchBounds

        public void setSearchBounds(Rectangle searchBounds)
        Set the search bounds rectangle. The search bounds rectangle is defined with respect to the centre of the template. Setting to null results in the entire image being searched.
        Parameters:
        searchBounds - the search bounds to set

      • analyseImage

        public void analyseImage(FImage image)
        Perform template matching. If a bounds rectangle is has not been set or is null, then the whole image will be searched. Otherwise the area of the image which lies in the previously set search bounds will be searched.
        Specified by:
        analyseImage in interface ImageAnalyser<FImage>
        Parameters:
        image - The image to process in place.
        See Also:
        ImageAnalyser.analyseImage(org.openimaj.image.Image)

      • getBestResponses

        public FValuePixel[] getBestResponses(int numResponses)
        Get the top-N "best" responses found by the template matcher.
        Parameters:
        numResponses - The number of responses
        Returns:
        the best responses found

      • getBestResponses

        public static FValuePixel[] getBestResponses(int numResponses,
                                             FImage responseMap,
                                             int offsetX,
                                             int offsetY,
                                             Comparator<FValuePixel> comparator)
        Get the top-N "best" responses found by the template matcher.
        Parameters:
        numResponses - The number of responses
        responseMap - The response map
        offsetX - the amount to shift pixels in the x direction
        offsetY - the amount to shift pixels in the y direction
        comparator - the comparator for determining the "best" responses
        Returns:
        the best responses found

      • getXOffset

        public int getXOffset()
        Returns:
        The x-offset of the top-left of the response map returned by getResponseMap() to the original image analysed by analyseImage(FImage).

      • getYOffset

        public int getYOffset()
        Returns:
        The y-offset of the top-left of the response map returned by getResponseMap() to the original image analysed by analyseImage(FImage).

      • getResponseMap

        public FImage getResponseMap()
        Returns:
        The responseMap generated from the last call to analyseImage(FImage)

      • getTemplate

        public FImage getTemplate()
        Returns:
        the template held by the matcher; this might be different to the image used in construction as it might have been pre-processed.

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws IOException
        Testing
